column2: Magical helmet created by the legendary mage for the warrior of peace.
Created by the legendary mage to increase ones combat ability.
Powerful defense sheild created by the legendary mage to combat evil.
Granted by the legendary mage, and not as powerful as the Sword of Darkness, but meant to bring peace to a war-torn world.
Magical helmet created by the legendary mage for the warrior of darkness.
Created by the legendary mage to increase ones combat ability.
Granted by the legendary mage, and not as powerful as the Aegis Shield, but meant to display fear from the sharp and terrifying thorns coming out of it.
Forged by the legendary mage to balance out the light. This sword is terrifying to behold!
